ygData.subject: Please stop .....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am not what you can call an active man on this mailing list. I have posted some questions, answered some but not much. So why this title ? Cause the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
I am not what you can call an active man on this mailing list. I have posted
some questions, answered some but not much. So why this title ? Cause the
last 5 or 6 digest i just receive were .. really boring... Ok, ok some
speaks about strategies but for the main part the last 5 digest speak about
: I am a wizzard and i want to become better then other classes (or prove
it)... Damn.. GUUYYSSSS.. I am the only one here who don't play a wizzard
without looking for this 1100 dommage spel ? I am the only one here who say
: yeah wizzard are powerful but no more then a warrior or a rogue or a clerc
or wahetever ?????? Verant makes a very good work at balancing and all the
classes are as good as yours. And YOU NEED ALL THE CLASSES...
want example ?
1. You can solo giant at level 49 ? WOW fine ? And what can you do with all
your power if you get rabbies with 30 hp left (from a lesser mummy ranging
level 12) ?
2. Oh shit i am just dead on the middle of nowhere killed by a griffon (damn
my spel at 800 just fizzles!) and i don t have any idea where is my corpse !
Oh wait a necro level 2 is in the zone.. "Hi can you locate my corpse please
?"
3. Yes, yes i just win vs terontula the giant spider hehe i am a GOD i am
the most powerfull man on th.... Oh .. Oh ... Where goes all my life bar..
140 hp left ? 90 ? Strong poison ? by the hell what s... "You have been
slain by a terontulla_00"... If only a clerc level 4 was next to me....
4. He, he , eh look at me guys i get all the kills ! POUM 175 dommage hehe
POUM 175 dommage hehe POUM 175 dommage hehe POUM 175 dommage hehe... Only 60
hp left for him hehe .. heu... Why is this big orc with big red eyes looking
at me dubiously ? Why he is going on me now.... HAAAA a crazy orc hit you by
54 dommage.. spel fizlle. you were hit by 48 dommage you were kick by 8
dommage.. you can not cast when stunned.. you were bashed by 49 dommage..
you were hit by 46 dommage... Your casting is interrupted ...HA SOMEONE HELP
ME ! Zorro backstab a crazy orc by 80 dommage.. Thanks rogue
friend...........

Ok i surely look crazy but if some here can understand what i am trying to
say here then you are welcome to join me anytime for fun. Please stop
telling wizzard is the most powerfull classe. It s just different. that s
all nothing more.


have fun

yakos

level 18 wizzard
karana

p.s. comments are welcome.. PLEASE DON'T COMMENT AND SAY : but at level
54545 i do 45454 dommage on a fire beetle !..
rep.s. i like my wizzard .. as i would like to play in the future a dwarf
clerc.. And a ogre warrior... And a halfling rogue and... the game is so
well balanced then really i want to play many char....
re reps. is it possible to switch to a nice mail list ? as before ?
Questions and answer ? THANKS :)
re re re p.s. no offense i am very awful in english hehe belgium online. Do
you know that the belgian guys can cast the "beer spel" ? :)
